header.title: Cong Yao
header.subtitle: Biotech Attorney Specializing in IP, Agreements, and AI

hero.title: Welcome, I'm Cong Yao
hero.description: Experienced IP and transactional attorney with deep understanding of biotech business, specializing in agreements, litigation, and strategic legal counsel for biotech companies.

about.title: About Me
about.content1: I'm an experienced IP and transactional attorney with deep expertise in biotechnology and pharmaceutical law. My practice spans intellectual property litigation, complex transactional agreements, and strategic business counsel. I understand the unique challenges biotech companies face and help them navigate legal complexities while advancing their business objectives.
about.content2: With extensive experience in patent litigation, licensing agreements, and corporate transactions, I provide practical legal solutions that align with business goals. Connect with me on

contact.title: Ask Cong!
contact.intro: Ask me anything on your mind, legal or otherwise (not giving legal advice :)
contact.limitMessage: ☕ Oops! My inbox is flooded and taking a coffee break! Come back tomorrow when I'm fresh and caffeinated.

form.name: Name
form.question: Question
form.questionPlaceholder: What's on your mind? Ask away!

contact.disclaimer: Important: Contacting me through this form does not create an attorney-client relationship. Do not submit confidential or privileged information. By submitting this form, you consent to the processing of your information for the purpose of responding to your inquiry and providing legal services.
contact.success: Thank you! I'll get back to you soon!
contact.error: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.
